com.microsoft.band

Interface BandPendingResult<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Result type

    public interface BandPendingResult<R>

    Represents a pending result from calling a Microsoft Band SDK method. The final result object from a PendingResult is of type R and can be retrieved in one of two ways:

         via blocking calls to await() or await(long, TimeUnit)

         or via a callback by passing in an object implementing interface BandResultCallback

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R await()
      Blocks the current thread until the task is completed
      R await(long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Blocks the current thread until the task is completed or this method times out
      void registerResultCallback(BandResultCallback<R> callback)
      Method to register a callback object to receive the result when it is returned.
      void registerResultCallback(BandResultCallback<R> callback, long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Method to register a callback object to receive the result when it is returned or when the timeout is reached.

    • Method Detail

      • await

        R await()
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
               BandException

        Blocks the current thread until the task is completed

        Should not be called from an application's main thread

        Returns:
        The result waited for
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the blocking thread is interrupted
        BandException - thrown if something goes wrong during the processing of the command (Specific BandErrorType values to be expected shown in each command's javadoc return section)

      • await

        R await(long timeout,
      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
               java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
               BandException

        Blocks the current thread until the task is completed or this method times out

        Should not be called from an application's main thread

        Parameters:
        timeout - Maximum time to wait in the given TimeUnit
        timeUnit - The given TimeUnit
        Returns:
        The result waited for
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the blocking thread is interrupted
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - thrown if the method times out
        BandException - thrown if something goes wrong during the processing of the command (Specific BandErrorType values to be expected shown in each command's javadoc return section)

      • registerResultCallback

        void registerResultCallback(BandResultCallback<R> callback)

        Method to register a callback object to receive the result when it is returned.

        If the method is already completed, the callback will be called immediately.

        Parameters:
        callback - object implementing BandResultCallback

      • registerResultCallback

        void registerResultCallback(BandResultCallback<R> callback,
                          long timeout,
                          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)

        Method to register a callback object to receive the result when it is returned or when the timeout is reached.

        If the method is already completed, the callback will be called immediately.

        Parameters:
        callback - object implementing BandResultCallback
        timeout - Maximum time to wait in the given TimeUnit
        timeUnit - The given TimeUnit
